Preterit.turoyo: u=malkofṣīḥ, w fṣīḥ, w gaḥəx, w mkayafle, bale u=mallaw i=emo bʕiǧi 490; 84/43; yatiwiaxəllemkayaffe
translations: ‘They sat down, ate and enjoyed themselves’; 44/161

Infectum.turoyo: huwe k-šoteqalyūndiḏe w mkayəf. aṯiabre d-u=qoḏ̣ew abre d-u=mufti, kītaʕmayyearbʕogreʕe 490; prs 63/26; prs 116/14; tux ánnaqqa d-uxlina w-mkayfinahulṣafro, d-maʕəlmina u=ʕamo!
translations: der Sohn des Richters und der Sohn des
‘Now let us eat and enjoy ourselves till morning. Then we will inform the people [that my husband and the bald-headed are dead]’; 44/160 [MT]

Imperativ.turoyo: šquluaxulu w lwašu w kayefu 491; prs 32/27;yatiwe kal ko-šotən w-k-uxli w-mkayfe-ne
translations: ‘They sat drinking, eating and having fun’ 75/293;
